description:
This portal gun can be used to teleport animals and farmbots. It can also be placed on any moving vehicle.

Our [b][url=https://discord.gg/PA2U3tZsyu]Discord Server[/url][/b]

[h1][b]Controls[/b][/h1]
[list]
[*] [b]LMB[/b] - Open the first portal
[*] [b]RMB[/b] - Open the second portal
[*] [b]R[/b] - Close both portals
[/list]

[h1][b]Credits[/b][/h1]
[list]
[*] [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198361178618]Questionable Mark[/url][/b] - Scripting, Portal Gun rig and effects
[*] [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198352947320]H20[/url][/b] - Thumbnail, posters, Portal Gun model, textures for portals and the main idea 
[*] [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198280635682]Driver[/url][/b] - Animations for Portal Gun
[/list]

[code]

This mod is not authorized for reposting on Steam. This still applies even with modifications.
[/code]

name: Portal Gun
